DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the relative effectiveness of three different mental health counseling interventions in the treatment of mental health problems commonly affecting torture and trauma survivors living in Kurdistan, Iraq.
DOC.brief_title: Controlled Trial of Mental Health Interventions for Torture Survivors in Kurdistan
DOC.criteria: at least 18 years old Kurdish torture survivor currently has significant depression symptomatology. danger to self or others already receiving treatment from our treatment provider not mentally competent to provide informed consent.
